headline: The Working Group's White paper on Japan and covid-19
description: <p><strong>Authorâ€™s note:</strong> This is a copy of the white paper of the Working Group, a group of four pseudonymous professionals in Tokyo. I, Patrick McKenzie, was the primary author. It was distributed quietly during the week of March 25th, 2020. I have written <a href="/2020/04/21/japan-coronavirus/">an essay describing how this document came to be and demonstrating its provenance</a>.</p>
